user_question: What are the top 5 tennis rackets for beginners and generate an image of a tennis court?
final_answer: Top 5 tennis rackets for beginners: 1) Wilson Clash 100, 2) Babolat Pure Drive, 3) Head Graphene 360 Speed S, 4) Yonex Ezone 100, 5) Prince Textreme Tour 100P. Image of a tennis court generated. The Babolat Pure Aero is highly recommended for improving spin.
